com.ensoftcorp.open.toolbox.commons.analysis

Class Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ensoftcorp.open.toolbox.commons.analysis.Analyzer

  • public abstract class Analyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing common functionality needed for any script. This class is immutable. It should be instantiated with the script's parameterized arguments, and the getter methods will do lazy evaluation as necessary.
    Author:
    Tom Deering, Ben Holland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Analyzer()
      Constructs a new script without options

      • setContext

        public void setContext(com.ensoftcorp.atlas.core.query.Q context)
